channel.title: Help please?
channel.description: Hi, I am trying to make a server, and i need help. How do i make it so that when other people download my client, it will run my server? :S So basically, how do i add the server into my client for people to download it and play when its online? :S

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Mwf2 Mwf2
item.description:
@Mwf2 wrote:

Is this what a GUI file is?

If it is, This is what is inside it when i click edit:

If its not, could you please show me pictures of what it looks like? :S i already checked my Files folder and all of them, none of them show something called “Gui”

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @koreybarnett koreybarnett
item.description:
@koreybarnett wrote:

ok when you open you client folder, somewhere in there should be a GUI file, right click it an select edit.
if the gui file isnt there i dont know what to suggest.
if it is there follow my last post tell me if it does not work

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @koreybarnett koreybarnett
item.description:
@koreybarnett wrote:

you need to change the server ip in the client.

open the gui press ctrl+f and search for serverip you should get something like this

System.out.println("Attempting to Connect"); Serverip = "0.0.0.0"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

the 0.0.0.0 is my server ip atm cause im developing
change the 0.0.0.0 for you ip address or you no-ip address.

i think this only works for 317 but im not too sure

if this is not the right sollution im sorry.

good luck

Read full topic
